scene.name: intro
scene.line: `(GREG is hard at work examining some diagrams, measuring angles with a plastic protractor and occasionally scribbling numbers in a small leather notebook.)`
Can I help you? Don't answer that.
scene.option: Sorry, we're looking for an "ingestion clerk".

scene.name: ingestion
scene.line: Oh, no, I'm an interior spatial analyst. I can't help you with that.
I think the ingestion clerks have all gone home for the night. Lula might be able to help you; she's pretty senior.

scene.name: lula-downstairs
scene.line: You just missed her, actually, she was up here about an hour ago. She's probably back at her real desk now, on the first floor.
She barely made a dent in these diagrams. Must have been distracted.
